title: Improve symbolic hack a bit
body_html:
Looks like scopes will take some time - means that we'd need to live with the hack for now.

The only important part is _unflatten in symbolic() to construct original inputs structure. Everything else is syntactic sugar and moving it to a nice place.

Tests are separate in fb-onnx-universe repo
